name: Classic Vegetable Upma
ingredients: 1 cup semolina (rava), 1 tbsp oil, 1 tsp mustard seeds, 1 tsp urad dal, 1 chopped onion, 1/4 cup chopped carrot, 1/4 cup beans, 2 cups water, salt to taste, curry leaves
preparation_steps: Heat oil in a pan. Add mustard seeds and let them splutter. Add urad dal and sauté until golden. Add chopped onions and cook until translucent. Add carrots and beans and sauté for 3 minutes. Add water and salt, bring to boil. Slowly add semolina while stirring continuously to avoid lumps. Cook until thick and soft. Cover and steam for 2 minutes before serving.

name: Masala Scrambled Eggs
ingredients: 3 eggs, 1 tbsp butter, 1 chopped onion, 1 chopped green chili, 1/4 tsp turmeric, salt, pepper
preparation_steps: Beat eggs in a bowl with salt and pepper. Heat butter in a pan. Add onions and green chili, sauté until soft. Add turmeric and stir. Pour beaten eggs and cook on low flame while stirring continuously until soft and fluffy.

name: Greek Yogurt Fruit Bowl
ingredients: 1 cup Greek yogurt, 1/4 cup blueberries, 1/4 cup strawberries, 1 tbsp honey, 1 tbsp chia seeds
preparation_steps: Add yogurt to bowl. Top with sliced fruits. Drizzle honey. Sprinkle chia seeds. Serve immediately.

name: Vegetable Fried Rice
ingredients: 2 cups cooked rice, 1/2 cup mixed vegetables, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tsp garlic paste, 1 tbsp oil, salt
preparation_steps: Heat oil in wok. Add garlic paste and sauté. Add vegetables and cook for 5 minutes. Add rice and mix well. Add soy sauce and salt. Stir fry on high flame for 5 minutes.

name: Chicken Biryani
ingredients: 2 cups basmati rice, 500g chicken, 1 cup yogurt, 2 onions sliced, 1 tbsp ginger garlic paste, biryani spices, salt, oil
preparation_steps: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 30 minutes. Fry onions until golden. Cook chicken with marinade until tender. Parboil rice separately. Layer rice and chicken in pot. Cook on low heat for 20 minutes. Garnish with fried onions.

name: Paneer Butter Masala
ingredients: 250g paneer cubes, 2 tomatoes, 1 onion, 1 tbsp butter, 1/2 cup cream, spices
preparation_steps: Sauté onion and tomatoes. Blend into smooth paste. Heat butter and add paste. Cook for 5 minutes. Add spices and cream. Add paneer cubes and simmer for 10 minutes.

name: Grilled Salmon
ingredients: 200g salmon fillet, 1 tbsp olive oil, salt, pepper, lemon juice
preparation_steps: Rub salmon with olive oil, salt and pepper. Preheat grill to medium heat. Grill salmon 6–8 minutes each side. Drizzle lemon juice before serving.

name: Tofu Stir Fry
ingredients: 200g tofu cubes, 1 cup broccoli, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tsp garlic, 1 tbsp oil
preparation_steps: Heat oil in pan. Add garlic and sauté. Add tofu cubes and cook until golden. Add broccoli and cook 5 minutes. Add soy sauce and stir.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
ingredients: 150g grilled chicken, 2 cups lettuce, 2 tbsp Caesar dressing, croutons
preparation_steps: Slice grilled chicken. Toss lettuce with dressing. Add chicken slices and top with croutons.

name: Quinoa Veg Bowl
ingredients: 1 cup quinoa, 1/2 cup chickpeas, cucumber, olive oil
preparation_steps: Cook quinoa as per instructions. Mix with chickpeas and vegetables. Drizzle olive oil.

name: Beef Tacos
ingredients: 200g minced beef, taco shells, lettuce, tomato, spices
preparation_steps: Cook beef with spices until browned. Fill taco shells with beef and toppings.

name: Vegetable Lasagna
ingredients: Lasagna sheets, tomato sauce, mixed vegetables, cheese
preparation_steps: Layer sheets, sauce and vegetables in baking dish. Top with cheese. Bake at 180°C for 30 minutes.

name: Chicken Curry
ingredients: 500g chicken, onion, tomato, ginger garlic paste, spices
preparation_steps: Sauté onions. Add ginger garlic paste and tomatoes. Add spices and chicken. Cook until tender.

name: Oats Pancakes
ingredients: 1 cup oats flour, 1 egg, 1/2 cup milk, honey
preparation_steps: Mix ingredients into smooth batter. Pour onto heated pan. Cook both sides until golden.

name: Shrimp Stir Fry
ingredients: 200g shrimp, vegetables, soy sauce, garlic
preparation_steps: Heat oil, sauté garlic. Add shrimp and cook until pink. Add vegetables and soy sauce. Stir fry 5 minutes.

name: Vegetable Pulao
ingredients: 1 cup basmati rice, 1/2 cup mixed vegetables (carrot, beans, peas), 1 sliced onion, 1 tsp ginger-garlic paste, 1 tbsp oil, 2 cups water, salt, whole spices (bay leaf, cloves)
preparation_steps: Heat oil in a pressure cooker. Add whole spices and sauté for 30 seconds. Add sliced onions and cook until golden. Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté. Add vegetables and cook for 3 minutes. Add washed rice and water. Add salt and mix well. Pressure cook for 2 whistles. Let steam release naturally. Fluff and serve.

name: Chicken Fried Rice Deluxe
ingredients: 2 cups cooked rice, 200g chicken breast diced, 1 egg, 1/2 cup vegetables, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp oil, garlic
preparation_steps: Heat oil in wok. Add garlic and sauté. Add diced chicken and cook until done. Push to side, scramble egg. Add vegetables and stir fry. Add rice and soy sauce. Toss everything together for 5 minutes on high heat.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: 200g spaghetti, 100g bacon, 2 eggs, 1/2 cup grated parmesan, black pepper, salt
preparation_steps: Boil spaghetti in salted water. Fry bacon until crispy. Beat eggs with parmesan and pepper. Drain pasta and mix immediately with bacon. Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture to create creamy sauce. Serve hot.

name: Vegetable Curry Coconut
ingredients: 1 cup mixed vegetables, 1 cup coconut milk, 1 tbsp curry paste, 1 tsp oil, salt
preparation_steps: Heat oil in pan. Add curry paste and sauté for 1 minute. Add vegetables and cook 5 minutes. Pour coconut milk and simmer for 10 minutes. Add salt and serve.

name: Grilled Lemon Chicken
ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, 2 tbsp lemon juice, 1 tbsp olive oil, salt, pepper, garlic powder
preparation_steps: Marinate chicken with lemon juice, oil, and spices for 20 minutes. Preheat grill. Grill chicken for 6–8 minutes each side until fully cooked. Rest 5 minutes before serving.

name: Stuffed Vegetable Omelette
ingredients: 3 eggs, 1/4 cup spinach, 1/4 cup mushrooms, 1 tbsp butter, salt, pepper
preparation_steps: Beat eggs with salt and pepper. Heat butter in pan. Add vegetables and sauté. Pour eggs over vegetables. Cook on low heat until set. Fold and serve.

name: Blueberry Pancakes
ingredients: 1 cup flour, 1 egg, 1 cup milk, 1/2 cup blueberries, 1 tsp baking powder
preparation_steps: Mix flour, baking powder, egg, and milk to form batter. Fold in blueberries. Pour ladle onto heated pan. Cook both sides until golden.

name: Avocado Egg Sandwich
ingredients: 2 slices whole wheat bread, 1 boiled egg, 1/2 avocado, salt, pepper
preparation_steps: Mash avocado with salt and pepper. Slice boiled egg. Spread avocado on bread and add egg slices. Close sandwich and serve.

name: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
ingredients: 1 cup boiled chickpeas, cucumber, tomato, 1 tbsp olive oil, lemon juice, salt
preparation_steps: Mix chickpeas with chopped vegetables. Add olive oil, lemon juice, and salt. Toss well and chill before serving.

name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
ingredients: 200g pasta, 200g chicken, 1 cup cream, 1/2 cup parmesan, garlic, butter
preparation_steps: Cook pasta. Sauté chicken in butter. Add garlic and cream. Simmer 5 minutes. Add parmesan. Mix pasta into sauce and cook 2 minutes.

name: Vegetable Quesadilla
ingredients: 2 tortillas, 1/2 cup cheese, bell peppers, onion, 1 tsp oil
preparation_steps: Heat oil in pan. Sauté vegetables. Place vegetables and cheese between tortillas. Cook on both sides until golden.

name: Thai Green Curry Chicken
ingredients: 300g chicken, 1 cup coconut milk, green curry paste, vegetables
preparation_steps: Sauté curry paste in oil. Add chicken and cook 5 minutes. Add coconut milk and vegetables. Simmer 15 minutes.

name: Spinach Mushroom Pasta
ingredients: 200g pasta, 1 cup spinach, 1/2 cup mushrooms, 1 tbsp olive oil, garlic
preparation_steps: Cook pasta. Sauté garlic and mushrooms in oil. Add spinach and cook until wilted. Mix with pasta.

name: Beef Burrito Bowl
ingredients: 200g beef, 1 cup rice, beans, salsa, cheese
preparation_steps: Cook beef with spices. Assemble bowl with rice, beef, beans, salsa, and cheese.

name: Banana Nut Oatmeal
ingredients: 1 cup oats, 1 banana, 1 tbsp chopped nuts, 1 cup milk
preparation_steps: Boil milk and oats. Add sliced banana and nuts. Cook until thick.

name: Chicken Shawarma Wrap
ingredients: 250g boneless chicken strips, 2 tbsp yogurt, 1 tsp paprika, 1 tsp cumin, 2 pita breads, lettuce, sliced onions, garlic sauce
preparation_steps: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices for 30 minutes. Heat a pan and cook chicken until browned and fully cooked. Warm pita bread. Add lettuce, onions, cooked chicken, and drizzle garlic sauce. Wrap tightly and serve.

name: Vegetable Hakka Noodles
ingredients: 200g noodles, 1 cup shredded cabbage, 1 carrot julienned, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tsp vinegar, 1 tbsp oil
preparation_steps: Boil noodles until al dente and drain. Heat oil in wok. Add vegetables and stir fry 3–4 minutes. Add noodles, soy sauce, vinegar, and toss on high heat for 5 minutes.

name: Grilled Turkey Sandwich
ingredients: 2 slices whole wheat bread, 120g turkey slices, lettuce, tomato, 1 tbsp mustard
preparation_steps: Toast bread lightly. Layer turkey, lettuce, tomato. Spread mustard. Close sandwich and cut in half.

name: Vegetable Manchurian
ingredients: 1 cup grated cabbage, 1/2 cup carrot, 2 tbsp flour, 1 tbsp soy sauce, garlic, oil
preparation_steps: Mix vegetables with flour and form small balls. Deep fry until golden. In another pan, sauté garlic, add soy sauce and water. Add fried balls and cook 5 minutes.

name: Chicken Tandoori
ingredients: 500g chicken pieces, 1 cup yogurt, 1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste, 1 tsp garam masala, salt
preparation_steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 2 hours. Preheat oven to 200°C. Bake for 25–30 minutes until fully cooked.

name: Spinach Feta Omelette
ingredients: 3 eggs, 1/4 cup spinach, 30g feta cheese, salt, pepper
preparation_steps: Beat eggs with salt and pepper. Heat pan, sauté spinach briefly. Pour eggs and cook until almost set. Add feta and fold omelette.

name: Chocolate Peanut Butter Smoothie
ingredients: 1 banana, 1 tbsp peanut butter, 1 tbsp cocoa powder, 1 cup milk
preparation_steps: Blend all ingredients until smooth and creamy. Serve chilled.

name: Egg Bhurji
ingredients: 3 eggs, 1 chopped onion, 1 chopped tomato, 1 tsp turmeric, 1 tbsp oil
preparation_steps: Heat oil, sauté onion and tomato. Add turmeric and salt. Pour beaten eggs and cook while stirring until scrambled.

name: Stuffed Paratha
ingredients: 2 cups wheat flour, 1 cup mashed potato, spices, oil
preparation_steps: Prepare dough with flour and water. Mix mashed potato with spices. Roll dough, stuff filling, flatten and cook on hot pan with oil.

name: French Crepes
ingredients: 1 cup flour, 2 eggs, 1 cup milk, 1 tbsp butter
preparation_steps: Whisk ingredients into smooth batter. Heat pan lightly greased. Pour thin layer and cook both sides.

name: Grilled Veggie Panini
ingredients: 2 slices ciabatta bread, grilled zucchini, bell peppers, cheese
preparation_steps: Layer grilled vegetables and cheese in bread. Press in panini maker until crisp.

name: Chicken Fajitas
ingredients: 250g chicken strips, bell peppers, onion, fajita seasoning, tortillas
preparation_steps: Cook chicken with seasoning. Add sliced vegetables and sauté. Serve in warm tortillas.

name: Vegetable Thai Basil Rice
ingredients: 2 cups cooked rice, basil leaves, chili, soy sauce, mixed vegetables
preparation_steps: Heat oil, sauté chili and vegetables. Add rice and soy sauce. Toss well. Stir in basil leaves at end.

name: Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: 300g beef strips, mushrooms, cream, onion, butter
preparation_steps: Sauté onion and mushrooms in butter. Add beef and cook until browned. Stir in cream and simmer 10 minutes.

name: Vegetable Shepherd's Pie
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables, 2 cups mashed potatoes, vegetable gravy
preparation_steps: Cook vegetables in gravy. Transfer to baking dish. Spread mashed potatoes on top. Bake at 180°C for 25 minutes.

name: Chicken Enchiladas
ingredients: 2 cups shredded chicken, 6 tortillas, 1 cup enchilada sauce, 1 cup shredded cheese, 1/2 cup onion
preparation_steps: Preheat oven to 180°C. Fill tortillas with chicken and onion. Roll and place in baking dish. Pour enchilada sauce over top and sprinkle cheese. Bake for 20–25 minutes until bubbly.

name: Vegetable Pad Thai (Classic)
ingredients: 200g rice noodles, 1 cup bean sprouts, 1/2 cup carrots, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp tamarind paste, 1 tbsp oil
preparation_steps: Soak noodles in warm water until soft. Heat oil in wok. Add vegetables and stir fry. Add noodles, soy sauce, and tamarind paste. Toss well for 5 minutes.

name: Grilled Chicken Caesar Wrap
ingredients: 1 grilled chicken breast, 1 tortilla, 1 cup lettuce, 2 tbsp Caesar dressing
preparation_steps: Slice grilled chicken. Toss lettuce with dressing. Place in tortilla with chicken and roll tightly.

name: Vegetable Bibimbap
ingredients: 1 cup rice, assorted sautéed vegetables, 1 fried egg, 1 tbsp gochujang
preparation_steps: Cook rice and arrange in bowl. Top with vegetables and fried egg. Add gochujang sauce and mix before eating.

name: Beef Meatballs
ingredients: 500g ground beef, 1 egg, breadcrumbs, garlic, tomato sauce
preparation_steps: Mix beef with egg, breadcrumbs, and garlic. Form balls and bake at 200°C for 20 minutes. Simmer in tomato sauce for 15 minutes.

name: Spinach Ricotta Stuffed Shells
ingredients: Pasta shells, 1 cup ricotta, 1 cup spinach, tomato sauce, cheese
preparation_steps: Boil pasta shells. Mix ricotta and spinach. Stuff shells and place in baking dish. Pour tomato sauce and sprinkle cheese. Bake 25 minutes.

name: Chicken Teriyaki
ingredients: 250g chicken thighs, 3 tbsp teriyaki sauce, 1 tsp sesame oil
preparation_steps: Cook chicken in sesame oil until browned. Add teriyaki sauce and simmer 10 minutes. Serve with rice.

name: Vegetable Couscous
ingredients: 1 cup couscous, 1 cup mixed vegetables, 1 tbsp olive oil
preparation_steps: Prepare couscous as per instructions. Sauté vegetables in olive oil. Mix together and season.

name: BBQ Pulled Chicken Sandwich
ingredients: 300g chicken breast, BBQ sauce, 2 burger buns
preparation_steps: Cook chicken until tender. Shred and mix with BBQ sauce. Fill into buns and serve.

name: Vegetable Gnocchi
ingredients: 500g gnocchi, tomato sauce, mixed vegetables, parmesan
preparation_steps: Boil gnocchi until floating. Sauté vegetables, add sauce, mix gnocchi. Sprinkle parmesan.

name: Chicken Pot Pie
ingredients: 2 cups cooked chicken, mixed vegetables, pie crust, cream sauce
preparation_steps: Preheat oven 190°C. Mix chicken and vegetables in cream sauce. Pour into pie crust. Cover with top crust and bake 35 minutes.

name: Vegetable Spring Rolls
ingredients: Spring roll wrappers, cabbage, carrot, soy sauce
preparation_steps: Fill wrappers with sautéed vegetables. Roll tightly and deep fry until golden.

name: Grilled Lamb Chops
ingredients: 4 lamb chops, rosemary, olive oil, salt
preparation_steps: Rub lamb with oil and rosemary. Grill each side 5–6 minutes for medium.

name: Vegetable Frittata
ingredients: 4 eggs, 1 cup mixed vegetables, 1/2 cup cheese
preparation_steps: Beat eggs and mix vegetables. Pour into greased pan. Cook on stove 5 minutes then bake 10 minutes.

name: Peanut Butter Banana Toast
ingredients: 2 slices bread, 2 tbsp peanut butter, 1 banana
preparation_steps: Toast bread. Spread peanut butter. Top with banana slices and serve.

name: Chicken Korma
ingredients: 500g chicken pieces, 1 cup yogurt, 1/2 cup cream, 1 sliced onion, 1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste, 1 tsp garam masala, 2 tbsp oil
preparation_steps: Heat oil in pan and sauté sliced onions until golden. Add ginger-garlic paste and cook 1 minute. Add chicken and cook until lightly browned. Add yogurt, cream, and spices. Cover and simmer on low heat for 25–30 minutes until chicken is tender.

name: Vegetable Paella
ingredients: 1 cup short-grain rice, 1 cup mixed vegetables, 2 cups vegetable broth, 1 tsp paprika, 1 tbsp olive oil
preparation_steps: Heat olive oil in wide pan. Add vegetables and sauté. Add rice and stir for 2 minutes. Add broth and paprika. Cook uncovered until rice absorbs liquid. Let rest 5 minutes before serving.

name: Beef Chili Con Carne
ingredients: 500g ground beef, 1 cup kidney beans, 1 chopped onion, 2 tomatoes, 1 tbsp chili powder, 1 tbsp oil
preparation_steps: Heat oil and sauté onion. Add beef and cook until browned. Add tomatoes, beans, and chili powder. Simmer on low heat for 30–40 minutes until thick.

name: Vegetable Ratatouille
ingredients: 1 zucchini, 1 eggplant, 1 bell pepper, 2 tomatoes, 2 tbsp olive oil, herbs
preparation_steps: Slice vegetables evenly. Layer in baking dish. Drizzle olive oil and sprinkle herbs. Bake at 180°C for 35–40 minutes.

name: Chicken Fried Noodles
ingredients: 200g noodles, 200g chicken strips, 1 cup vegetables, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp oil
preparation_steps: Boil noodles until tender. Heat oil and cook chicken until done. Add vegetables and sauté. Add noodles and soy sauce. Toss for 5 minutes.

name: Vegetable Burrito
ingredients: 1 cup cooked rice, 1/2 cup black beans, salsa, tortilla, 1/4 cup cheese
preparation_steps: Warm tortilla. Place rice, beans, salsa, and cheese in center. Fold sides and roll tightly.

name: Grilled Fish Tacos
ingredients: 200g white fish fillet, taco shells, cabbage slaw, lime juice
preparation_steps: Season fish and grill 5–6 minutes each side. Fill taco shells with fish and cabbage. Drizzle lime juice.

name: Vegetable Moussaka
ingredients: Eggplant slices, tomato sauce, béchamel sauce, olive oil
preparation_steps: Fry eggplant slices lightly. Layer eggplant and tomato sauce in baking dish. Top with béchamel. Bake at 180°C for 40 minutes.

name: Chicken Fried Steak
ingredients: 2 beef steaks, flour, egg, breadcrumbs, oil
preparation_steps: Coat steak in flour, dip in beaten egg, then breadcrumbs. Deep fry until golden brown.

name: Vegetable Lentil Stew
ingredients: 1 cup lentils, carrot, celery, onion, 3 cups vegetable broth
preparation_steps: Sauté onion and celery. Add lentils and broth. Simmer for 30 minutes until lentils are soft.

name: Classic Pancakes
ingredients: 1 cup flour, 1 egg, 1 cup milk, 1 tsp baking powder
preparation_steps: Mix dry and wet ingredients separately then combine. Pour batter on hot pan and cook both sides until golden.

name: Egg and Spinach Breakfast Wrap
ingredients: 2 eggs, 1 tortilla, 1/2 cup spinach, 1 tbsp butter
preparation_steps: Scramble eggs in butter. Add spinach and cook until wilted. Place in tortilla and wrap tightly.

name: Vegetable Uttapam
ingredients: 1 cup dosa batter, chopped onion, tomato, green chili
preparation_steps: Pour batter on hot pan. Sprinkle vegetables on top. Cook both sides until golden.

name: Smoked Salmon Bagel
ingredients: 1 bagel, 80g smoked salmon, cream cheese, capers
preparation_steps: Slice and toast bagel. Spread cream cheese. Add salmon and capers.

name: Peanut Butter Smoothie Bowl
ingredients: 1 banana, 2 tbsp peanut butter, 1 cup milk, granola
preparation_steps: Blend banana, peanut butter, and milk. Pour into bowl and top with granola.

name: Chicken Alfredo Lasagna
ingredients: Lasagna sheets, 2 cups cooked chicken, 2 cups Alfredo sauce, 1 cup mozzarella, 1/2 cup parmesan
preparation_steps: Preheat oven to 180°C. Layer lasagna sheets with chicken and Alfredo sauce. Repeat layers. Top with mozzarella and parmesan. Bake 40–45 minutes until golden.

name: Vegetable Szechuan Rice
ingredients: 2 cups cooked rice, 1 cup mixed vegetables, 1 tbsp Szechuan sauce, 1 tbsp oil
preparation_steps: Heat oil in wok. Add vegetables and sauté 4 minutes. Add rice and Szechuan sauce. Stir fry on high heat for 5 minutes.

name: Beef Gyros
ingredients: 300g beef strips, pita bread, yogurt sauce, tomato, onion
preparation_steps: Cook seasoned beef in skillet until browned. Warm pita bread. Fill with beef and toppings. Drizzle yogurt sauce.

name: Vegetable Sushi Rolls
ingredients: 2 cups sushi rice, nori sheets, cucumber, carrot, avocado
preparation_steps: Cook sushi rice and let cool. Spread rice on nori sheet. Add vegetables. Roll tightly and slice with sharp knife.

name: Chicken Marsala
ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, 1 cup mushrooms, 1/2 cup Marsala wine, 1 tbsp butter
preparation_steps: Cook chicken in butter until golden. Remove and sauté mushrooms. Add Marsala wine and simmer 5 minutes. Return chicken and cook until tender.

name: Vegetable Falafel Plate
ingredients: 1 cup chickpeas, garlic, parsley, spices, pita bread
preparation_steps: Blend chickpeas with garlic and parsley. Form balls and fry until golden. Serve with pita and salad.

name: BBQ Beef Ribs
ingredients: 1kg beef ribs, BBQ sauce, salt, pepper
preparation_steps: Season ribs with salt and pepper. Bake at 180°C for 1 hour. Brush with BBQ sauce and bake another 20 minutes.

name: Vegetable Yakisoba
ingredients: 200g noodles, cabbage, carrot, soy sauce, sesame oil
preparation_steps: Boil noodles. Stir fry vegetables in sesame oil. Add noodles and soy sauce. Toss for 5 minutes.

name: Chicken Katsu
ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, flour, egg, breadcrumbs, oil
preparation_steps: Coat chicken in flour, dip in egg, then breadcrumbs. Deep fry until golden and cooked through.

name: Vegetable Risotto
ingredients: 1 cup arborio rice, 3 cups vegetable broth, mushrooms, parmesan
preparation_steps: Sauté mushrooms. Add rice and stir. Gradually add warm broth while stirring until creamy. Finish with parmesan.

name: Beef Lasagna
ingredients: Lasagna sheets, 500g ground beef, tomato sauce, mozzarella, parmesan
preparation_steps: Cook beef with tomato sauce. Layer sheets with beef sauce and cheese. Bake at 180°C for 45 minutes.

name: Vegetable Tofu Buddha Bowl
ingredients: 1 cup brown rice, 200g tofu, broccoli, carrots, soy sauce
preparation_steps: Cook rice. Pan fry tofu until golden. Steam vegetables. Assemble bowl and drizzle soy sauce.

name: Chicken Pesto Pasta
ingredients: 200g pasta, 200g chicken, 3 tbsp pesto sauce, parmesan
preparation_steps: Cook pasta. Grill chicken and slice. Mix pasta with pesto and chicken. Sprinkle parmesan.

name: Vegetable Chili
ingredients: Kidney beans, black beans, tomato, chili powder
preparation_steps: Cook beans with tomatoes and spices. Simmer 30 minutes until thick.

name: Grilled Shrimp Skewers
ingredients: 300g shrimp, olive oil, garlic, lemon
preparation_steps: Marinate shrimp in oil and garlic 15 minutes. Thread onto skewers and grill 3–4 minutes per side.

name: Chicken Parmesan Pasta
ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, 200g pasta, 1 cup tomato sauce, 1 cup mozzarella, breadcrumbs
preparation_steps: Coat chicken in breadcrumbs and fry until golden. Boil pasta until al dente. Place chicken over pasta, pour tomato sauce, sprinkle mozzarella and bake 10 minutes until cheese melts.

name: Vegetable Jambalaya
ingredients: 1 cup rice, 1 cup bell peppers, celery, onion, Cajun seasoning, vegetable broth
preparation_steps: Sauté onion, celery, and peppers. Add rice and seasoning. Pour broth and simmer 25 minutes until rice is cooked.

name: Beef Tacos Supreme
ingredients: 300g ground beef, taco shells, lettuce, cheese, salsa
preparation_steps: Cook beef with taco seasoning. Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

name: Vegetable Pot Pie
ingredients: Mixed vegetables, pie crust, cream sauce
preparation_steps: Cook vegetables in cream sauce. Pour into pie crust. Cover with top crust and bake at 180°C for 35 minutes.

name: Chicken Fried Rice Spicy
ingredients: 2 cups cooked rice, 200g chicken, chili sauce, vegetables
preparation_steps: Cook chicken until browned. Add vegetables and stir fry. Add rice and chili sauce. Toss 5 minutes.

name: Vegetable Enchiladas
ingredients: Tortillas, black beans, corn, enchilada sauce, cheese
preparation_steps: Fill tortillas with beans and corn. Roll and place in baking dish. Cover with sauce and cheese. Bake 20 minutes.

name: Grilled Steak Salad
ingredients: 250g steak, lettuce, cherry tomatoes, olive oil
preparation_steps: Grill steak 4–5 minutes per side. Slice and serve over lettuce with tomatoes and olive oil.

name: Vegetable Thai Curry Red
ingredients: 1 cup mixed vegetables, 1 cup coconut milk, red curry paste
preparation_steps: Sauté curry paste. Add vegetables and cook 5 minutes. Add coconut milk and simmer 15 minutes.

name: Chicken Fettuccine Alfredo
ingredients: 200g fettuccine, 250g chicken, 1 cup cream, parmesan
preparation_steps: Cook pasta. Grill chicken and slice. Simmer cream with parmesan. Mix pasta and chicken into sauce.

name: Vegetable Sushi Bowl
ingredients: Sushi rice, cucumber, carrot, avocado, soy sauce
preparation_steps: Cook sushi rice and cool slightly. Top with vegetables and drizzle soy sauce.

name: Beef Burger Deluxe
ingredients: Beef patty, burger bun, lettuce, cheese, tomato
preparation_steps: Grill beef patty until cooked. Toast bun lightly. Assemble burger with toppings.

name: Vegetable Goulash
ingredients: Pasta, bell peppers, tomato sauce, paprika
preparation_steps: Boil pasta. Cook vegetables with paprika and tomato sauce. Mix with pasta and simmer 10 minutes.

name: Chicken Shawarma Plate
ingredients: 300g chicken thighs, yogurt, spices, rice
preparation_steps: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices 1 hour. Grill until cooked. Serve over rice.

name: Vegetable Samosa
ingredients: Pastry sheets, mashed potatoes, peas, spices
preparation_steps: Mix potatoes with peas and spices. Fill pastry sheets and fold into triangles. Deep fry until golden.

name: Grilled Tuna Steak
ingredients: 250g tuna steak, olive oil, salt, pepper
preparation_steps: Brush tuna with olive oil and season. Grill 3–4 minutes per side for medium rare.

name: Chicken Dum Biryani
ingredients: 2 cups basmati rice, 600g chicken, 1 cup yogurt, 2 sliced onions, 1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste, biryani masala, saffron milk, 3 tbsp oil
preparation_steps: Wash and soak basmati rice for 30 minutes. Marinate chicken with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, salt, and biryani masala for at least 1 hour. Heat oil in a heavy-bottom pot and fry sliced onions until golden brown. Remove half for garnish. Add marinated chicken and cook until 70% done. In another pot, boil water with salt and cook rice until 70% cooked, then drain. Layer rice over chicken. Sprinkle saffron milk and fried onions on top. Cover tightly and cook on very low flame for 20–25 minutes (dum cooking). Turn off heat and let rest 10 minutes before serving.

name: Vegetable Thai Green Curry
ingredients: 1 cup broccoli, 1 cup carrots, 1 cup bell peppers, 1 cup coconut milk, 2 tbsp green curry paste, 1 tbsp oil
preparation_steps: Heat oil in a deep pan over medium heat. Add green curry paste and sauté for 1–2 minutes until aromatic. Add vegetables and stir fry for 3–4 minutes. Pour coconut milk and mix well. Bring to gentle boil, then reduce heat and simmer 15 minutes until vegetables are tender but not mushy. Adjust salt and serve hot with rice.

name: Beef Stroganoff Classic
ingredients: 500g beef strips, 1 sliced onion, 1 cup mushrooms, 1 cup sour cream, 2 tbsp butter, 1 cup beef broth
preparation_steps: Melt butter in a large skillet. Add onion and cook until soft. Add mushrooms and sauté until browned. Add beef strips and cook on high heat until sealed. Pour beef broth and simmer 20 minutes until meat is tender. Reduce heat and stir in sour cream. Cook gently for 5 minutes without boiling. Serve over noodles.

name: Vegetable Baked Ziti
ingredients: 300g ziti pasta, 2 cups tomato sauce, 1 cup ricotta, 1 cup mozzarella, 1 tbsp olive oil
preparation_steps: Boil pasta in salted water until al dente. Drain and mix with olive oil to prevent sticking. In baking dish, spread thin layer of sauce. Add half pasta, spoon ricotta, more sauce, and mozzarella. Repeat layers. Bake at 180°C for 30 minutes until cheese is melted and golden.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
ingredients: 600g chicken cubes, 1 cup yogurt, 1 cup tomato puree, 1/2 cup cream, spices, 2 tbsp oil
preparation_steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for at least 1 hour. Grill or pan-sear chicken until lightly charred. In another pan, heat oil and cook tomato puree with spices for 10 minutes. Add cream and simmer 5 minutes. Add grilled chicken and cook together for 15 minutes until fully tender.

name: Vegetable Fried Dumplings
ingredients: Dumpling wrappers, 1 cup cabbage, 1/2 cup carrots, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tsp sesame oil
preparation_steps: Finely chop cabbage and carrots. Mix with soy sauce and sesame oil. Place small spoonful filling in wrapper. Fold and seal edges with water. Heat oil in pan and arrange dumplings. Cook until bottom turns golden. Add 1/4 cup water and cover to steam for 5 minutes. Remove lid and cook until water evaporates.

name: Grilled Lemon Herb Fish
ingredients: 2 fish fillets, 2 tbsp olive oil, lemon zest, mixed herbs, salt
preparation_steps: Pat fish dry. Rub with olive oil, lemon zest, herbs, and salt. Preheat grill to medium. Grill fillets 4–5 minutes per side until flaky. Let rest 2 minutes before serving.

name: Vegetable Shakshuka (Classic)
ingredients: 4 eggs, 2 tomatoes, 1 onion, 1 bell pepper, paprika, olive oil
preparation_steps: Heat olive oil in skillet. Sauté chopped onion and bell pepper until soft. Add chopped tomatoes and paprika. Simmer 10 minutes until thick. Make small wells and crack eggs into sauce. Cover and cook until egg whites set but yolks remain soft.

name: Chicken Pad Thai
ingredients: 200g rice noodles, 250g chicken, 2 eggs, bean sprouts, tamarind sauce
preparation_steps: Soak noodles in warm water until soft. Heat oil in wok and cook chicken until done. Push to side and scramble eggs. Add noodles and tamarind sauce. Toss well and cook 5 minutes. Add bean sprouts last and stir gently.

name: Vegetable Spinach Lasagna
ingredients: Lasagna sheets, 2 cups spinach, 1 cup ricotta, 1 cup mozzarella, tomato sauce
preparation_steps: Blanch spinach and squeeze out excess water. Mix with ricotta. Layer pasta sheets with tomato sauce and spinach mixture. Repeat layers. Top with mozzarella. Bake at 180°C for 40 minutes until bubbling.

name: Beef Stir Fry Garlic
ingredients: 500g beef strips, 4 cloves garlic, 1 cup broccoli, soy sauce, oil
preparation_steps: Heat oil in wok. Add sliced garlic and sauté until fragrant. Add beef strips and cook on high heat until browned. Add broccoli and stir fry 3–4 minutes. Add soy sauce and cook 2 more minutes.

name: Vegetable Tofu Curry Indian
ingredients: 250g tofu cubes, 1 onion, 2 tomatoes, spices, 1 tbsp oil
preparation_steps: Heat oil and sauté chopped onion until golden. Add ginger-garlic paste and cook 1 minute. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft. Add spices and tofu cubes. Simmer 15 minutes with lid covered.

name: Chicken Quesadilla Deluxe
ingredients: 2 tortillas, 250g chicken, bell peppers, cheese, oil
preparation_steps: Cook chicken with spices until fully done. Sauté sliced peppers separately. Place chicken and peppers on tortilla, sprinkle cheese, cover with another tortilla. Cook on pan until golden both sides and cheese melts.

name: Vegetable Minestrone Soup
ingredients: Mixed vegetables, beans, pasta, vegetable broth
preparation_steps: Heat oil in pot and sauté vegetables 5 minutes. Add broth and bring to boil. Add pasta and cook until tender. Add beans and simmer 10 minutes. Season before serving.

name: Grilled Chicken Breast Classic
ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, olive oil, salt, black pepper
preparation_steps: Pat chicken dry and rub with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Preheat grill. Grill 6–7 minutes each side until internal temperature reaches 75°C. Let rest 5 minutes before slicing.

name: Creamy Mushroom Pasta
ingredients: 200g pasta, 2 cups sliced mushrooms, 3 cloves garlic minced, 1 cup heavy cream, 1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese, 1 tbsp olive oil, salt, black pepper
preparation_steps: Boil a large pot of salted water and cook pasta until al dente according to package instructions. Reserve 1/2 cup pasta water before draining. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add sliced mushrooms and cook for 6–8 minutes until golden brown and soft. Add minced garlic and sauté for 30 seconds until fragrant. Pour in heavy cream and allow it to gently simmer for 5–7 minutes until slightly thickened. Stir in grated parmesan cheese and mix until smooth. Add drained pasta into the sauce and toss well. If sauce is too thick, add reserved pasta water gradually. Season with salt and black pepper. Serve hot.

name: Chicken Teriyaki Bowl
ingredients: 250g chicken thighs sliced, 2 cups cooked rice, 3 tbsp teriyaki sauce, 1 cup broccoli florets, 1 carrot sliced, 1 tbsp sesame oil
preparation_steps: Heat sesame oil in a pan over medium heat. Add sliced chicken and cook 6–8 minutes until fully cooked and lightly browned. Add broccoli and carrots and cook for 3–4 minutes. Pour teriyaki sauce over chicken and vegetables. Simmer for 3 minutes until sauce thickens and coats everything evenly. In a bowl, add warm rice and top with teriyaki chicken mixture. Serve immediately.

name: Vegetable Lasagna Classic
ingredients: Lasagna sheets, 2 cups tomato sauce, 1 cup ricotta cheese, 1 cup shredded mozzarella, 1 zucchini sliced, 1 cup spinach, 2 tbsp olive oil
preparation_steps: Preheat oven to 180°C. Lightly sauté zucchini and spinach in olive oil for 5 minutes. Boil lasagna sheets until slightly soft and drain. In a baking dish, spread thin layer of tomato sauce. Add layer of lasagna sheets, ricotta, vegetables, mozzarella. Repeat layers. Finish with mozzarella on top. Bake for 35–40 minutes until cheese is melted and golden. Let rest 10 minutes before slicing.

name: Grilled Garlic Butter Shrimp
ingredients: 300g shrimp cleaned, 3 tbsp butter, 4 cloves garlic minced, 1 tbsp lemon juice, salt, pepper
preparation_steps: Melt butter in a pan over medium heat. Add minced garlic and sauté for 30 seconds. Add shrimp and cook 2–3 minutes per side until pink and opaque. Add lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Stir well and cook another minute. Remove from heat and serve immediately.

name: Vegetable Pad Thai (With Egg)
ingredients: 200g rice noodles, 1 cup bean sprouts, 1 carrot julienned, 2 eggs beaten, 2 tbsp tamarind sauce, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp oil
preparation_steps: Soak rice noodles in warm water for 20 minutes until soft. Heat oil in wok. Add beaten eggs and scramble lightly. Add carrot and stir fry for 2 minutes. Add noodles, tamarind sauce, and soy sauce. Toss continuously for 5–6 minutes. Add bean sprouts at the end and mix gently. Serve hot.

name: Chicken Parmesan
ingredients: 2 chicken breasts flattened, 1 cup breadcrumbs, 1 egg beaten, 1 cup tomato sauce, 1 cup mozzarella, olive oil
preparation_steps: Preheat oven to 190°C. Dip chicken in beaten egg then coat in breadcrumbs. Heat olive oil in pan and fry chicken until golden on both sides. Place fried chicken in baking dish. Spread tomato sauce on top and sprinkle mozzarella. Bake for 20 minutes until cheese melts and chicken is fully cooked.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry Deluxe
ingredients: 1 cup broccoli, 1 bell pepper sliced, 1 carrot sliced, 1 zucchini sliced, 2 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp oil, 2 cloves garlic
preparation_steps: Heat oil in wok over high heat. Add garlic and sauté briefly. Add broccoli and carrot first and stir fry 3 minutes. Add bell pepper and zucchini and cook 3–4 more minutes. Add soy sauce and toss well. Cook until vegetables are tender-crisp. Serve immediately.

name: Beef Tacos Authentic
ingredients: 300g ground beef, taco shells, 1 onion chopped, 1 tomato chopped, taco seasoning, shredded lettuce
preparation_steps: Cook ground beef with chopped onion over medium heat until browned. Add taco seasoning and a splash of water. Simmer for 5 minutes. Warm taco shells. Fill shells with beef mixture, lettuce, and tomato. Serve immediately.

name: Vegetable Shakshuka (Hearty)
ingredients: 4 eggs, 2 tomatoes chopped, 1 onion chopped, 1 bell pepper sliced, 2 tbsp olive oil, paprika
preparation_steps: Heat olive oil in skillet. Sauté onion and bell pepper until soft. Add tomatoes and paprika. Simmer 10–15 minutes until thick sauce forms. Make small wells in sauce and crack eggs into them. Cover and cook until egg whites set but yolks remain slightly runny.

name: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
ingredients: 200g chicken breast, 2 cups romaine lettuce, 3 tbsp Caesar dressing, croutons, parmesan
preparation_steps: Season chicken with salt and pepper and grill 6–7 minutes per side until fully cooked. Slice chicken. Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing. Top with grilled chicken, croutons, and grated parmesan. Serve fresh.

name: Vegetable Biryani Aromatic
ingredients: 2 cups basmati rice, 1 cup mixed vegetables (carrot, beans, peas), 1 sliced onion, 1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste, 1/2 cup yogurt, whole spices (bay leaf, cloves, cinnamon), 3 tbsp oil, salt
preparation_steps: Wash and soak basmati rice for 30 minutes. Heat oil in a heavy pot and sauté whole spices for 30 seconds. Add sliced onion and cook until golden. Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté 1 minute. Add vegetables and cook 5 minutes. Stir in yogurt and salt. In another pot, parboil rice until 70% cooked and drain. Layer rice over vegetables. Cover tightly and cook on low heat for 20 minutes. Let rest 10 minutes before serving.

name: Chicken Fried Noodles Street Style
ingredients: 250g noodles, 250g chicken strips, 1 cup cabbage shredded, 1 carrot julienned, 2 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp oil, 2 cloves garlic
preparation_steps: Boil noodles until al dente and drain. Heat oil in wok and sauté garlic. Add chicken and cook until fully done. Add cabbage and carrot and stir fry 3 minutes. Add noodles and soy sauce. Toss everything on high heat for 5–6 minutes.

name: Beef Stroganoff Creamy
ingredients: 500g beef strips, 1 onion sliced, 1 cup mushrooms, 1 cup sour cream, 2 tbsp butter, 1 cup beef broth
preparation_steps: Melt butter in skillet and sauté onion until soft. Add mushrooms and cook until browned. Add beef and cook on high heat until sealed. Pour beef broth and simmer 25 minutes until tender. Stir in sour cream and cook 5 minutes without boiling.

name: Vegetable Pasta Primavera
ingredients: 200g pasta, 1 cup broccoli, 1 zucchini sliced, 1 bell pepper sliced, 1/2 cup cream, 2 tbsp olive oil
preparation_steps: Cook pasta in salted water and drain. Heat olive oil in pan and sauté vegetables until tender. Add cream and simmer 5 minutes. Toss cooked pasta into sauce and mix well. Season and serve.

name: Chicken Tikka Oven Style
ingredients: 600g chicken pieces, 1 cup yogurt, 1 tbsp ginger-garlic paste, 1 tsp red chili powder, 1 tsp garam masala, salt, 2 tbsp oil
preparation_steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt, spices, salt and oil for at least 1 hour. Preheat oven to 200°C. Arrange chicken on baking tray. Bake 25–30 minutes until fully cooked and slightly charred.

name: Vegetable Quesadilla Cheesy
ingredients: 2 tortillas, 1 cup mixed vegetables, 1 cup shredded cheese, 1 tbsp oil
preparation_steps: Heat oil in pan and sauté vegetables 5 minutes. Place vegetables and cheese on one tortilla and cover with another. Cook both sides until golden and cheese melts. Cut into wedges.

name: Grilled Lemon Fish
ingredients: 2 fish fillets, 2 tbsp olive oil, lemon juice, salt, pepper
preparation_steps: Pat fish dry. Rub with olive oil, lemon juice, salt and pepper. Grill on medium heat 4–5 minutes each side until flaky.

name: Vegetable Ramen Bowl
ingredients: Ramen noodles, 1 cup mushrooms, 1 cup spinach, 3 cups vegetable broth, soy sauce
preparation_steps: Boil broth in pot. Add noodles and cook until tender. Stir in vegetables and cook 3–4 minutes. Add soy sauce and serve hot.

name: Chicken Alfredo Lasagna (Extra Cheese)
ingredients: Lasagna sheets, 2 cups Alfredo sauce, 2 cups cooked chicken shredded, 1 cup mozzarella
preparation_steps: Layer sheets with Alfredo sauce and chicken. Repeat layers. Top with mozzarella. Bake at 180°C for 40–45 minutes until golden.

name: Vegetable Falafel Wrap
ingredients: 1 cup chickpeas, garlic, parsley, spices, pita bread
preparation_steps: Blend chickpeas with garlic and spices. Form small balls and fry until golden. Place inside warm pita bread with vegetables.

name: Beef Burger Classic
ingredients: Beef patty, burger bun, lettuce, tomato, cheese, 1 tbsp oil
preparation_steps: Heat pan and cook beef patty 4–5 minutes per side. Toast bun lightly. Assemble with lettuce, tomato and cheese.

name: Vegetable Dumplings Steamed
ingredients: Dumpling wrappers, 1 cup cabbage, 1 carrot grated, soy sauce
preparation_steps: Mix cabbage and carrot with soy sauce. Fill wrappers and seal edges. Steam dumplings for 10–12 minutes until cooked through.

name: Chicken Biryani Simple
ingredients: 2 cups basmati rice, 500g chicken, 1 onion, spices, 2 tbsp oil
preparation_steps: Cook chicken with spices until tender. Parboil rice separately. Layer rice over chicken. Cover and cook on low flame 20 minutes.

name: Vegetable Fried Rice Deluxe
ingredients: 2 cups cooked rice, 1 cup vegetables, 2 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp oil
preparation_steps: Heat oil in wok. Add vegetables and cook 5 minutes. Add rice and soy sauce. Toss on high heat 5 minutes.

name: Grilled Chicken Wrap
ingredients: Grilled chicken strips, tortilla, lettuce, yogurt sauce
preparation_steps: Warm tortilla. Add chicken and lettuce. Drizzle yogurt sauce. Roll tightly and serve.

name: Vegetable Spinach Curry
ingredients: 2 cups spinach, 1 onion, 2 tomatoes, spices, 1 tbsp oil
preparation_steps: Sauté onion until golden. Add tomatoes and cook until soft. Add spices and spinach. Cook 10 minutes until spinach is tender.

name: Beef Stir Fry Spicy
ingredients: 500g beef strips, chili sauce, garlic, 1 cup bell peppers
preparation_steps: Heat oil and sauté garlic. Add beef and cook until browned. Add bell peppers and chili sauce. Stir fry 5 minutes.

name: Vegetable Pizza Homemade
ingredients: Pizza dough, tomato sauce, 1 cup vegetables, 1 cup mozzarella
preparation_steps: Preheat oven to 220°C. Spread sauce over rolled dough. Add vegetables and mozzarella. Bake 15–20 minutes until crust is golden.

name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
ingredients: Grilled chicken, tortilla, romaine lettuce, Caesar dressing
preparation_steps: Slice grilled chicken. Toss lettuce with dressing. Place in tortilla and wrap tightly.

name: Vegetable Pesto Pasta
ingredients: 200g pasta, 3 tbsp pesto sauce, 1 cup cherry tomatoes, olive oil
preparation_steps: Boil pasta until al dente. Heat olive oil and lightly sauté tomatoes. Add pasta and pesto sauce. Toss well and serve hot.
